messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
This is at 711 Horseshoe Loop. Somebody has been shot.
Are you calling for the police and an ambulance?
Yes, we are across the road from it. I don't know the exact number.
Do you know who got shot?
It's an investigator who has been staying over there. They said to call an ambulance, he’s been shot.
Who got shot, ma'am?
I think it's Joe Harris. He's been working with Ed Morrison.
Okay, ma'am. We need to get more information. She's outside yelling?
Yes, she's been shot. Please call an ambulance.
We are calling for an ambulance right now. The address is 678 Horseshoe Loop?
Yes, it’s right across the street. We don't have a phone inside there.
How far is it from your house?
We can see the light on their porch, which is literally across the street.
Could you call the Sheriff's Department directly?
Oh, okay. I thought this was the same place.
We're sending quite a few officers out there now.
Do you know how many officers are up there? I'm talking to Joe Harris.
Okay, Joe Harris. Do you know who shot him?
No, we don't know who shot him. Just send somebody fast with an ambulance.
We are sending everyone over there right now, okay?
Okay.
If anything else happens, give us a call right back.
Alright.
I don't want to put you in any danger. If you feel unsafe, lock your doors and windows and stay inside, okay?
Yeah.
